attributes.action: Abolish the Welsh Assembly, and restore Britain.
attributes.additional_details:
To abolish the Welsh Assembly, and to make Britain one again; we now live in a federalist country, we do not need that nor; do we want it. It is also costing the country dear, and Wales has not delieved. Becasue of this, Wales is now the poorest part of the country, and Wales can't cope without Westminster, also, Wales has another MPs to represent it, and Wales doe not need anymore, in the form of AM. Mps are another. AMs are a waste

I want the Government to give a vote to the individuals of Wales, and to make sure that it would have to be above 50% for, or against to be law, otherwise, hold another
